title: VR health & safety tour of a facility that provided fake text
content: Let’s harness interactive technologies to improve health and safety in New Zealand! We all know technology has its place in improving workplace health and safety and we see the technology behind Augmented & Virtual Reality as a great opportunity to make a measurable difference to the way we and other agencies operate.
author: Jarryd
